DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study confirm safe effective use Celluma3 reduction appearance periorbital wrinkle .
DOC.brief_title: A Confirmatory Study Evaluation Treatment Celluma3 Periorbital Wrinkles
DOC.detailed_description: This clinical study open label investigation use Celluma3 effective treatment periorbital wrinkle . Test subject visit study center thirty minute treatment , three time per week , period four week , twelve week post-treatment follow final treatment . Test subject photo take start , end four week treatment , final twelve week post-treatment follow visit . One three Clinical Investigators , act Principal Investigator three Clinical Investigators evaluate test subject inclusion final result . The Clinical Research Associate ( CRA ) monitor study conformance test protocol . There seven esthetician participate study fifty test subject recruit .
